original_text: You should understand that food first goes into people's mouths. Then it goes into their stomach, and then it passes out of their body.
korean_text: 입으로 들어가는 모든 것은 배로 들어가서 뒤로 내버려지는 줄 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: that food first goes into people's mouths
sentences.korean_translation: 음식이 먼저 사람들의 입으로 들어간다는 것을

sentences.original_text: Then it goes into their stomach
and then it passes out of their body
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그것이 그들의 몸 밖으로 나간다
